contentencoded:
In a few weeks, Apple will unveil new software -- and possibly new hardware -- for developers who work with the company's devices.

Exactly what will be announced at the Worldwide Developers Conference on June 10 is anybody's guess, but the rumor mill is already churning.

Nathan Ingraham, who writes for The Verge, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.
